name: Torch Tombs
description:
Torch Tombs is a random generated dungeon-crawler adventure game inside an egyptian pyramid, where you control two characters and discover the ancient unknowns.

Torch Tombs can be played with  1 or 2 people.


Controllers
Space Key - pass the torch

Male Character

W - up

S  - down

A - left

D - right

Female Character

Up Arrow Key - up

Down Arrow Key - down

Left Arrow Key - left

Right Arrow Key - Right 

How to Play

The torch functions as a main projectile. So, to destroy enemies you need to hit them with the torch.
Make sure that the enemies are in the middle of the trajectory of the torch.


Objective

Explore rooms and complete all maps.


Developers

Game Art / Pixel Art - Leandro Ferreira

Music Composer - Kai

Game Programming - Renato Proença
